contextId.information: This phrase refers to Judas' death and likely to his judgment after death. AT: "to go where he belongs" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: to go to his own place

contextId.information: "died." See how you translated this phrase with reference to Ananias in [[:en:bible:notes:act:05:03|5:5]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
This is a polite expression that means he "died." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
This was a polite way to refer to death. AT: "he died" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
